channel.title: [Clean] DeltaScape [Clean]
channel.description:
[center][font=Verdana][size=20pt]DELTACLEAN[/size][/font][/center]
Because no matter how hard people try, Everybody still uses DeltaScape, and because its mainly in experienced programmars who use it, i thought we might aswell have them starting with this, to learn conventions and work with cleaner code
So what i've done is quickly whip this up.
[center][font=Verdana][size=20pt]Notable Features[/size][/font][/center]
- Everything DeltaScape has - Grahams EventManager - Full Indentation across all classes - Removed over 1000 dead code fragments - Follows 100% Convention across classes (Except for the basic packaging) - Has multiple notorious Delta-Bugs Fixed - Runs ALOT smoother then regular DeltaScape - Alot more - Download and look.
Just for the record, I, in no way support the use of DeltaScape but if people insist on using it, they might aswell use this version of it so they learn some basic fundamentals.
Download Link : Forgot to fix a bug, sec.
Rep is appreciated
Credits -
Jonny J Graham Delta Anybody else who wants some
<3
